thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Symon

author: Symon
title: Symon
text: Intrepid Travel is an amazing travel company with Staff with excellent Customer service skills and Knowledge about all of there Destinations and travel styles and Terms and conditions. I booked a trip to a country i did not know anything thing about and they made the trip a wonderfull experience from the moment i booked to the day i arrived home. On tour we had an excellent Tour leader who who informative, Funny and interested in her job as i can see passion and love for her job. and i would in the future have no doubts booking with intrepid again in the future. A great Company who care for the locals in each country.
